mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(memberno, id, passwd, mname, tel, zipcode, address1, address2, mdate, genre1,genre2,keyword) VALUES (member_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{passwd}, #{mname}, #{tel}, #{zipcode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, sysdate, #{genre1},#{genre2},#{keyword})
mapper.select: SELECT memberno, id, mname, tel, address1, mdate, genre1,genre2 FROM member ORDER BY memberno ASC
